LanguageData.VME_BookWriting_Exalted.stages.0.label: wrote a book
LanguageData.VME_BookWriting_Exalted.stages.0.descrip: I did it! I am now a distinguished author.
LanguageData.VME_BookWriting_Disliked.stages.0.label: wrote a book
LanguageData.VME_BookWriting_Disliked.stages.0.descri: I had to write a book. Putting your thoughts to paper is sinful and disgusting.
